Artists: Salman Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan, Tabu, Sonali Bendre, Mohnish Bahl, Shakti Kapoor, Alok Nath

Name: Raju Chacha
Plot: Siddhant Rai is a single father, looking after three young children. All four of them live a wealthy and comfortable lifestyle, which changes suddenly when Siddhant passes away after a car accident.
Artists: Kajol, Ajay Devgan, Rishi Kapoor, Tiku Talsania,

Name: Deewane
Plot: A woman (Urmila Matondkar) doesn't realize that the dedicated cop (Ajay Devgan) she loves is in a coma and a small-time crook who resembles him has been sent home in his place.
Artists: Ajay Devgan, Urmila Matondkar, Mahima Chaudhry, Paresh Rawal, Gulshan Grover, Shivaji Satam

Name: Benaam Badsha
Plot: Abandoned by his parents, a child grows into a life of crime, only to have one of his victims offer him redemption and a better life.
Artists: Anil Kapoor, Juhi Chawla, Amrish Puri, Ashok Saraf, Rohini Hattangadi, Satish Shah. Rakesh Bedi, Viju Khote, Rakesh Bedi,  Seema Deo

Name: Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaye
Plot: Prem is in love with Nisha and plans to marry her, but on the day of the marriage Nisha does not show up. When Prem asks for an explanation, Nisha tells him that she is marry a rich and wealthy young man from the U.S., who will be able to look after her and her ailing brother, devastating Prem.
Artists: Salman Khan, Rani Mukerji, Jackie Shroff, Raveena Tandon, Inder Kumar, Pooja Batra, Kashmira Shah, Mohnish Bahl, Shakti Kapoor, Reema Lagoo

Name: Deewanapan
Plot: A rebel crosses swords with an influential rich man after falling in love with his daughter. However the girl's father is hell bent to break their relation at any cost.
Artists: Arjun Rampal, Dia Mirza, Vinod Khanna

Name: Hello
Plot: Call-center workers (Amrita Arora, Sharman Joshi, Gul Panag) receive a phone call from God.
Artists: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Sohail Khan, Sharman Joshi, Eesha Koppikhar, Gul Panag, Amrita Arora, Dalip Tahil, Suresh Menon, Sharat Saxena, Shashi Kiran, Arbaaz Khan, Bharti Achrekar, Rishi Nijhawan

Name: Jab Pyaar Kisisie Hota Hai
Plot: A Playboy's past catches up with him, when he wants to get married. Kabir address him as son of Suraj.
Artists: Salman Khan, Twinkle Khanna, Johnny Lever, Farida Jalal, Aditya Narayan, Namrata Shirodkar, Mushtaq Khan, Saeed Jaffrey

Name: Rain: The Terror Within
Plot: Sandhya Bhatnagar a blind writer lives alone with her mysterious past and a serious rain phobia. One day a reporter named Prakash who is a fan of her novels comes to meet her. He befriends her and somehow she reveals her past that she was raped by a man as a teenager.
Artists: Himanshu Malik, Meghna Naidu, Panne Chatterjee, Rajdev Jamdade, Vijay Shukla

Name: Karle Pyaar Karle
Plot: Karle Pyaar Karle is a love story of two rebels, Kabir and Preet, who are playing the game of their life. Since their childhood, Kabir and Preet indulged in playing dangerous games trying to fight the fear and complexes within.
Artists: Shiv Darshan, Hasleen Kaur, Aham Sharma, Tanya Malik, Ankit Raaj

Name: Muqaddar Ka Sikandar
Plot: Homeless and orphaned, Sikandar rarely finds compassion on the mean streets of India, as he lives one day to the next doing whatever he can to survive. When he finds work at the house of the wealthy Ramanath, Sikandar quickly falls for his employer's daughter, Kaamna.
Artists: Amitabh Bachchan, Rakhee, Vinod Khanna, Amjad Khan, Kader Khan, Rekha

Name: Jaane Tu...Ya Jaane Na
Plot: A pair of very close friends are pushed to get married by the Wadias. However, both friends disagree and decide to each seek out a soul mate for the other.
Artists: Imran Khan, Genelia D'Souza, Manjari Phadnis, Ayaz Khan

Name: Beqabu
Plot: Raja, a criminal, comes across Zanjhar Singh, a terrorist, and he has him imprisoned. For his own safety Raja re-locates to the Kapoor household where his estranged father lives and where Raja falls for the beautiful Reshmi Kapoor.
Artists: Sanjay Kapoor, Mamta Kulkarni, Amrish Puri, Shakti Kapoor, Himani Shivpuri

Name: Garv: Pride and Honour
Plot: About to retire, police inspector Samar Singh changes his mind when he discovers that a recently elected official has ties with the underworld.
Artists: Salman Khan, Shilpa Shetty, Kundra, Arbaaz Khan, Amrish Puri, Rajpal Yadav, Farida Jalal

Name: Mard
Plot: Assistant Commissioner of Police, Arjun is an honest police officer who gets transferred regularly. As a punishment for his impeccable integrity, Arjun is sent to a Police station which is a part of the area ruled by underworld don Satyalal.
Artists: Mithun Chakraborty, Ravali, Shakti Kapoor, Gulshan Grover, Raza Murad, Johnny Lever, Kader Khan

Name: Pyare Mohan
Plot: The Indian underworld is ruled by Don Tony Fernandez and his little brother Tiny. Tony decides to call time on crime and so goes to confess in a Church.
Artists: Fardeen Khan, Vivek Oberoi, Esha Deol, Amrita Rao, Sanjay Mishra, Boman Irani

Name: Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Plot: Rahul wants a decent job and loves Anjali, his landlord's daughter, while Harry wants all the riches and comforts of life without having to work too hard towards it. The other couple in the story is that of Sapna and Prakash. The movie spices up
Artists: Saif Ali Khan, Fardeen Khan, Aftab Shivdasani, Sonali Bendre, Johnny Lever, Sharat Saxena

Name: Aapko Pehle Bhi Kahin Dekha Hai
Plot: A suspended cop based in Calgary, who is looking for a criminal, falls in love with a girl whose overprotective father believes that no man is good enough to marry his daughter.
Artists: Priyanshu Chatterjee, Sakshi Shivanand, Farida Jalal, Om Puri

Name: Fool N Final
Plot: The lives of a career criminal, his girlfriend and her maternal uncle collide when the nephew of a British don steals a diamond.
Artists: Sunny Deol, Shahid Kapoor, Ayesha Takia, Sameera Reddy and Vivek Oberoi, Paresh Rawal, Johnny Lever, Sharmila Tagore, Arbaaz Khan, Om Puri and Chunkey Pandey

Name: Salaakhen
Plot: When an honest school teacher testifies in a rape case against a prominent businessman's son, he is psychologically tortured and forced to commit suicide. His young son then takes the law into his own hands in order to avenge his father.
Artists: Sunny Deol, Raveena Tandon, Anupam Kher, Amrish Puri, Farida Jalal

Name: Naseeb
Plot: A group of friends get their hands on a winning lottery ticket, which destroys their friendship. Two of the friends turn on the other two, killing one and framing the other.
Artists: Amitabh Bachchan, Shatrughan Sinha, Rishi Kapoor, Hema Malini, Kader Khan, Amrish Puri, Reena Roy

Name: Nazar Ke Samne
Plot: When an innocent man is wrongly imprisoned for murder and given a death sentence, his lawyer has one week to track down the real killer.
Artists: Akshay Kumar, Farheen, Ekta Sohini, Mukesh Khanna, Dalip Tahil

Name: Jeena Sirf Merre Liye
Plot: Pooja and Karan are childhood sweethearts. They separate shortly after but they do not forget their vows. Later Pooja meets Karan, only to find out that he has a girlfriend by the name of Seema.
Artists: Vijayendra Ghatge, Kareena Kapoor, Tusshar Kapoor, Kader Khan, Alok Nath, Satish Shah, Mallika Sherawat, Himani Shivpuri

Name: Tezz
Plot: To avenge his past, Aakash Rana plants a bomb in a train, endangering the lives of 500 passengers.
Artists: Anil Kapoor, Ajay Devgn, Mohanlal, Kangana Ranaut, Zayed Khan, Boman Irani, Sameera Reddy, Avika Gor

Name: Toilet - Ek Prem Katha
Plot: A woman threatens to leave her husband unless he installs a toilet in their home.
Artists: Akshay Kumar, Anupam Kher, Bhumi Pednekar
